description: Part 1 – Introduction to Project Management In addition to leadership, motivation and communications skills, Project Management involves task planning, cost estimation, measuring and controlling the execution of tasks. Through a combination of lectures, seminars, case studies/tutorials, students will be introduced to the relevant quantitative processes and tools of project managements. Part 2 – Humanitarian Engineering To understand the roles of engineers in advancing the society, student will first be introduced to Professional Engineering Societies to understand how they help them advance their careers. Students will then work on a group project to address one of the grand challenges in Humanitarian Engineering.
title: Mechanical Engineering and Society
